About Us.

Mountain Trekking

Climb the Roof of Africa "Mt Kilimanjaro",and explore the flora and fauna rain forest. Treking on this mountain offers high plateau,volcanoes and mountain ranges.Fulfill your dream on climbing the Roof of Africa. Not only Mt Kilimanjaro, also Ngorongoro Conservation Area, Mt Meru peak and many more.

Wildlife Safari

We center around and interaction with local animals and plant life in their natural habitats.We often offer customized tour packages and safaris to allow close access to wildlife in Tanzania.

Cultural Safari

Tanzania is the country where by its people encompasses the social behavior and norms,as well as beliefs arts ,laws,and customs.The Maasai, Pare, Sambaa, Gogo, Nyakyusa and many more are nilotic ethnic group inhabiting in Tanzania.They show their culture,economic activities (farming,pastoralism and fishing).

Luxury Safari

We also provide personalised service, preferably one on one good-quality beds with good-quality bed linen reliable transport comfortable seats when travelling, with plenty of legroom good-quality food and wine exclusivity positive and professional interaction with staff.

Camping Safari

We literally immerse yourself in nature and become a part of it. you sleep outside on the earth, feel the natural breeze, listen to the sounds of bugs, trees and even wild animals. Luckily, Tanzania has a lot of great camping sites in national parks, forests and even the beach that you could choose from.

Beach and Holiday

The coral sands of the mainland and islands are soft,powdery and white The oceans are brilliantly blue and awesomely warm.Zanzibar is blessed with largely beach accommodation.The diving and snorkeling are done in marine parks. The aquatic life seen includes; dolphins, moray eels, lion fish, octopus and lobster.
